title: Stepbrother and Company
description: If you thought nothing could be more taboo than Stepbrother Summer, you won’t believe what happens in the fall!After two months of forbidden love at the cottage, Sheree crashes at the townhouse Adam shares with a motley crew of college students. There are no spare rooms, but she doesn't mind sleeping on the couch. It’ll only be until she finds a job. No big deal, right?But Sheree isn’t interested in mainstream work. She lounges around all day, tempting her stepbrother and annoying Adam’s rent-paying housemates.When Adam and his roomies find out about the sordid online business Sheree’s built right under their noses, will they kick her to the curb… or choose to be used?A steamy stepbrother romance novel including multiple partners and mind-blowing ménage!
author: Giselle Renarde
